game.name: Dangerous Mountain Together
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Team up in this chaotic 2-4 player co-op RC car adventure! Navigate dangerous mountain roads while tethered together, pulling each other back from disaster. Climb steep hills, survive wild weather, and reach the top without tumbling into the abyss!
